name: Yummy Ice Pops
description:
Nothing is better to eat on a hot day than having yummy ice pops! Create your own flavor some ice pops today and watch them transform in front of your eyes. Start by preparing all the ingredients, adding them to the blender, placing your mixture into your icy pole containers before freezing them to create the best tasting ice pops around. Become a professional chef and create your very own ice pops today with this yummy ice pops game!

Features:
Wash, peel, and cut your ingredients ready to flavour your icy poles.
Shake your milk before adding it with sugar and your fruity delights into the blender.
Pour your mixture into your icy pole containers before placing them in the freezer.
Pull your icy pops out from their containers and enjoy eating them all up.
